alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower over Hialeah, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Miami Beach, Surfside, Miami Gardens, Hallandale, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka, West Park, Miami Springs and Sweetwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
